summary: A childhood friend has been missing for as long as you can remember. You decide to investigate the abandoned town in which he used to live only to find something truly unexpected and even more so unexplainable. Have you got what it takes to find out what happened to Chris Williams?

name: 02Rhythm
summary: 02Rhythm is a rhythm game developed for mobile phones. Inspired by popular rhythm games such as Hatsune Miku: Project Diva and the Persona: Dancing All Night series, it is played by tapping on the screen in the rhythm of the music.
